external_games.name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Falklands - Pack 1

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes of the Falklands - Pack 1
summary: Heroes of the Falklands Battle Pack 1 brings you to the windswept, rocky landscape of the Falkland Islands—or Islas Malvinas, as they are known by the Argentines. The brief but brutal war in 1982 began after the Argentines unexpectedly seized Stanley, the capital of the Falklands
